long_description: Small but mighty, the Goal Zero Switch 8 portable recharger breathes life into your phone, music player, or tablet. Bring it wherever your adventures may lead for extra power when you're on the go. Powerful lithium battery is light and powerful and holds a full charge for up to 6 months; charge it up from a solar panel (sold separately) or USB. USB in and out offer a simple and straightforward design for easy use.
short_description: Small but mighty, the Goal Zero Switch 8 portable recharger breathes life into your phone, music player, or tablet. Bring it wherever your adventures may lead for extra power when you're on the go.
